verses.roman:
se-rātri rahilā haridevera maṇḍire
rātre mahāprabhu kare manete vicāre

synonyms: se-rātri—that night; rahilā—remained; hari-devera—of Harideva; mandire—in the temple; rātre—at night; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kare—does; manete—in the mind; vicāre—consideration.
translation: That night the Lord stayed at the temple of Harideva, and during the night He began to reflect.
